channel.title: Runeshock - Passive Mode - Real RS Drop Formula - Player Sleeping
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/140vgd5.png[/img]
[B][I]Related Threads:[/I][/B] [url=http://share.pho.to/4e3pp]World of Runeshock[/url] - Old Media [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657933.0.html]Runeshock Resting[/url] - Currently in progress. [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657792.0.html]Runeshock Drops[/url] - The Real RS Formula [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659985.0.html]Runeshock Passive Mode[/url] - Outdated version
[b][i]Information:[/i][/b] [spoiler] -Switched to Netty for stability -Player saving re-done (.25s). -Cleaned out the useless code. -Minor bugs have been fixed. -Re-logging objects are fixed. -Multipliers are display titles. -Original players set at 100X. -1-2500X Experience Multiplier. -Experience multiplier displayed. -Herblore has been redone. -Farming has been started (Clearing Weeds). -Agility is fully functional.(Gnome Course). -Thieving Scimitar Stall. (Added Timer). -Adding Burning random. (Cooking). -Filling water at any location.[/spoiler]
[i][b]Server Media:[/b][/i] [spoiler=Runeshock] [url=http://pho.to/8f3Zk]Dialogues[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3dd]Minigames[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3eP]Passive Mode[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3ev]Tabs + Legend[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3g8]New Bank Interface[/url][/spoiler]

item.title: Runeshock - Passive Mode - Real RS Drop Formula - Player Sleeping
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[center]

[B][I]Related Threads:[/I][/B]
World of Runeshock - Old Media
Runeshock Resting - Currently in progress.
Runeshock Drops - The Real RS Formula
Runeshock Passive Mode - Outdated version

Information:
[spoiler]
-Switched to Netty for stability
-Player saving re-done (.25s).
-Cleaned out the useless code.
-Minor bugs have been fixed.
-Re-logging objects are fixed.
-Multipliers are display titles.
-Original players set at 100X.
-1-2500X Experience Multiplier.
-Experience multiplier displayed.
-Herblore has been redone.
-Farming has been started (Clearing Weeds).
-Agility is fully functional.(Gnome Course).
-Thieving Scimitar Stall. (Added Timer).
-Adding Burning random. (Cooking).
-Filling water at any location.[/spoiler]

Server Media:
[spoiler=Runeshock]
Dialogues
Minigames
Passive Mode
Tabs + Legend
New Bank Interface[/spoiler]
